text: allahvai anri marrevaraiyavatu nan iraivanaka etuttuk kolvena? Ellap porulkalukkum avane iraivanaka irukkinran - pavam ceyyum ovvor atmavum tanakke, kettait tetikkolkiratu or atmavin (pavac)cumaiyai marror atma cumakkatu. Pinnar, ninkal (anaivarum) unkal iraivan pakkame tirumpic cella ventiyatirukkiratu appotu ninkal pinanki vivatam ceytu kontiruntavai parri avan unkalukku arivippan" enru (napiye!) Nir kurum
